snippet: The private equity firm Advent International agreed on Tuesday to buy Cytec Industries’ coating resins business for $1.15 billion as it sought to add to its chemicals portfolio.
abstract: The private equity firm Advent International agreed on Tuesday to buy Cytec Industries’ coating resins business for $1.15 billion as it sought to add to its chemicals portfolio.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: The private equity firm Advent International agreed on Tuesday to buy Cytec Industries’ coating resins business for $1.15 billion as it sought to add to its chemicals portfolio. The unit makes and sells synthetic components for paints, and generated about $1.6 billion in revenue last year. Read more »

headline.main: Advent to Buy Cytec’s Coating Resin Business for $1.15 Billion
